temples.name: Indianapolis Indiana Temple
temples.history: The Indianapolis Indiana Temple is the 148th operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints worldwide and the first in Indiana, dedicated unto the Lord on August 23, 2015 over three sessions by Henry B. Eyring, at the time First Counselor in the First Presidency of Thomas S. Monson.

temples.name: Detroit Michigan Temple
temples.history: The Detroit Michigan Temple is the 63rd operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints worldwide, dedicated unto the Lord on October, 23, 1999 by Gordon B. Hinkley, 15th President of the Church.

temples.name: Chicago Illinois Temple
temples.history: The Chicago IllinoisTemple is the 35th operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints worldwide and the second in Illinois, dedicated unto the Lord on August 13, 1983 by Gordon B. Hinkley, at the time Second Counselor in the First Presidency of Spencer W. Kimball.

temples.name: Louisville Kentucky Temple
temples.history: The Louisville Kentucky Temple is the 76th operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints worldwide, dedicated unto the Lord on March 19, 2000 by Thomas S. Monson, at the time First Counselor in the First Presidency of Gordon B. Hinkley.
